text: Wolfgang Pfeifer (born July 3, 1935) is a German former footballer. He won two caps for the East German national team at the end of the 1950s. In the East German top division he appeared 287 times. == References == == External links == * * * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:East German footballers Category:East Germany international footballers Category:Dresdner SC players Category:Dynamo Dresden players Category:DDR-Oberliga players Category:Association football defenders
title: Wolfgang Pfeifer
